events.text: Press Tab to enable mouse cursor! Click on the orange blocks using left mouse button to open up the transformation menu!

Once you open up the menu, drag blocks in using the left mouse button!. You can modify the transfomation properties using the different blocks. The inputs are colour coded:  
Red is for the [color=#FF0004]X Axis[/color] Green is for  [color=#A5EFAC]Y Axis[/color] and Blue is for [color=#003aff]Z Axis[/color]
Once you dragged the blocks in, press [b]run code[/b]  to see the transformations happen!.
